mapper.sql: sku . `sku_id` ,sku.`spu_id`, sku.`sku_name`, sku.`sku_desc`, sku.`catalog_id`, sku.`brand_id`, sku.`sku_default_img`, sku.`sku_title`, sku.`sku_subtitle`, sku.`price`, sku.`sale_count`, sku.`comment_count`
mapper.select: SELECT,brand.`name` AS brand_name, spu.`weight` FROM pms_sku_info sku LEFT JOIN pms_spu_info spu ON sku.spu_id = spu.id LEFT JOIN pms_brand brand ON sku.brand_id = brand.brand_id WHERE sku.sku_id = #{skuId}

SELECT
FROM pms_sku_info AS sku WHERE sku_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{keyword}, '%' ) UNION SELECT
FROM pms_sku_info AS sku WHERE sku_title LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{keyword}, '%' ) UNION SELECT
FROM pms_sku_info AS sku WHERE sku_subtitle LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{keyword}, '%' ) UNION SELECT
FROM pms_sku_info AS sku LEFT JOIN pms_brand AS brand ON sku.brand_id = brand.brand_id WHERE brand.`name` LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{keyword}, '%' )

SELECT
FROM pms_sku_info AS sku WHERE sku.`catalog_id`= #{catalogId}
